entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 p.m. MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 15.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 9:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 15.2°C

Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 38 %

Wind: ESE 11 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Local smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Local smoke. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
